cohere_api_key.info: The Cohere API Key to use for the Cohere model.

temperature.info: Controls randomness. Lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more creative.

success.model_created: Cohere language model created successfully with temperature: {temperature}

errors.creation_failed: Failed to create Cohere language model. Please verify your API key and try again. Error: {error}

logs.initializing: Initializing Cohere language model with temperature: {temperature}
